page.title: 12PLAYGROUND GAMES-2
page.content: Stingball. About 5 people line up against the wall. A person 10 metres away throws a tennis ball at the others. If someone is hit, he has to throw at the others. Handstands. A group play with one person telling the others to do a certain kind of handstand against the wall. Whoever does the best one will go out and call the next handstand. Elastic. You have one long piece of elastic tied to make a band.Two people stand inside it to keep it tight. The others take it in turns to jump the elastic in different styles. Fishes in the net. One person is the catcher; when he catches someone they join hands and try to catch another person. Wallball. People take it in turns to kick a tennis ball against a wall. As long as they hit the wall,they stay in
